testcase.classname: Application test for deal page test
testcase.name: user able to create new deal
testcase.system-out: Given user is on home.......................................................passed When user clicks on deals tab and select New deal option....................passed And user lands on Deal Page.................................................passed Then user enter deal details and save.......................................passed And verify new deal created successfully....................................passed

testcase.name: Validate login application successfully.
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login Page.................................................passed When user logged in to application by entering username and password........passed Then user validate homepage Title...........................................passed Then user validate logged in username label.................................passed

testcase.name: user is able to create new contact
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged into FREECRM application using username and password...passed When user is on Your HomePage...............................................passed Then user click on Contacts Link and select New Contacts....................passed And user landed on new Contact page.........................................passed Then user enters details of the new contact and save........................passed
